strings.Value: "As sovereign of these lands, I demand you give me that monster's head."
[Attack] "I'll be taking that monster's head... and yours as well!"
[Leave] "A good hunt to you!"
"The way you've handled it was amazing. Great job!"
"You're good warriors. Gorum smiled when he saw how you dispatched that monster!"
{n}The hunter lifts the wyvern's severed head in triumph.{/n} "You see that? Bang, down, it's done! Now that's how we deal with these beasts back in Embeth Forest!"
"Hells no! That's not how this works. You may be lord, master, and almighty on your lands, but this is the hunt, and a deal's a deal: anything we kill is our trophy!"

{n}The hunter hides the wyvern's severed head in a bag, then spits and glares at you.{/n} "What's wrong with you? How 'bout you stop getting in our way and just mind your own hunt? That beast's almost fled — how 'bout you give it a whistle!"
"To you as well!"
"Thanks for the kind words! Yeah, unfortunately, we're used to it. Our homeland gives us no slack: every week there's another hungry beast to deal with!"
"Is it like this everywhere? Is there no place left in the world where people can live without fear?"
"You'd better just give it to us while we're asking nicely..."
"Don't try to scare us, boy! We've faced horrors you haven't even seen in your worst nightmares!"
"They are right. These are the terms you agreed to."
"You haven't seen anything unless you've been up north! You seen a mammoth? It's the size of a mountain! Hair like forests! Tusks so long, each one could impale a whole tribe!"
"Yes, we know what a mammoth is. Sure, we don't have those here — but trust me, we've had our share of monsters."
"Now that's something becoming of a baron{mf||ess}! What's yours is now ours, losers!"
"I dare not disobey Your Grace's orders... but still, this is mean and despicable."
"We kill all kinds of monsters — flying ones, crawling ones... You think we can't dispatch a few two-legged ones?"
"No offense, Your Grace, but {g|Gorum}Gorum's{/g} not exactly our kind of deity. He wants his worshipers to fight as much as possible, while our goal is to help keep actual fighting to a minimum!"
